resources.string: First thing to do is to select the date when you last put a new blade in.
Mark each day you\'ve used the blade to shave by choosing the day and tapping the razor icon on the menu.
You can modify the comment for a day or change the recorded blade uses by tapping a shave-day and pressing the edit icon.
When you start a new blade, choose the day and tap the blade menu item.
If you have more than one razor that you use daily, you can add these using the options in the top menu.
Adding a shave will only add it to the currently selected razor. Shaves registered to another razor are shown slightly greyed out.
Change the current razor by swiping left and right.
